content: <metadata>   <idinfo>     <citation>       <citeinfo>         <origin>Denver Sheriff's Department</origin>         <pubdate>20140519</pubdate>         <title> Sheriff Office Locations</title>         <geoform>vector digital data</geoform>       </citeinfo>     </citation>     <descript>       <abstract>Location of Denver Sheriff's offices. Tabular data includes the location name as defined by the Sheriff's Office, street address, additional information to assist the public in locating the sheriff's office, office phone numbers, primary and secondary email address, hours of operation, additional office description information, services available at specified location, and an image name associated with the sheriff's office.</abstract>       <purpose>This layer was created to show Denver Sheriff Office locations within the City and County of Denver.</purpose>     </descript>     <status>       <progress>Complete</progress>       <update>As needed</update>     </status>     <spdom>       <bounding>         <westbc>-104.994855</westbc>         <eastbc>-104.860696</eastbc>         <northbc>39.795850</northbc>         <southbc>39.727014</southbc>       </bounding>     </spdom>     <keywords>       <theme>         <themekt>None</themekt>         <themekey>service</themekey>         <themekey>safety</themekey>       </theme>       <theme>         <themekt>ISO 19115 Topic Categories</themekt>         <themekey>society</themekey>       </theme>       <place>         <placekt>None</placekt>         <placekey>Denver</placekey>         <placekey>Denver County</placekey>         <placekey>Colorado</placekey>         <placekey>USA</placekey>       </place>     </keywords>     <accconst>None</accconst>     <useconst>ACCESS CONSTRAINTS:   None.   USE CONSTRAINTS: The City and County of Denver is not responsible and shall not be liable to the user for damages of any kind arising out of the use of data or information provided by the City and County of Denver, including the installation of the data or information, its use, or the results obtained from its use.   ANY DATA OR INFORMATION PROVIDED BY THE City and County of Denver IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  Data or information provided by the City and County of Denver shall be used and relied upon only at the user's sole risk, and the user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the City and County of Denver, its officials, officers and employees from any liability arising out of the use of the data/information provided.   NOT FOR ENGINEERING PURPOSES </useconst>     <datacred>Denver Sheriff's Department; edited and maintained by City and County of Denver - TS/ Enterprise Data Management</datacred>     <secinfo>       <secsys>AVAILABLE</secsys>       <secclass>Unclassified</secclass>       <sechandl>Available to the public and accessible through the Denver\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds Open Data Catalog, http://data.denvergov.org/</sechandl>     </secinfo>     <native>Microsoft Windows Server 2008 R2 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; ESRI ArcGIS 10.0.5.4400</native>   </idinfo>   <dataqual>     <logic>(A general description of the resource's lineage... how the data was developed.)</logic>   </dataqual>   <spdoinfo>     <direct>Vector</direct>     <ptvctinf>       <sdtsterm>         <sdtstype>Entity point</sdtstype>         <ptvctcnt>7</ptvctcnt>       </sdtsterm>     </ptvctinf>   </spdoinfo>   <spref>     <horizsys>       <geograph>         <latres>8.9831528411952133e-009</latres>         <longres>8.9831528411952133e-009</longres>         <geogunit>Decimal Degrees</geogunit>       </geograph>       <geodetic>         <horizdn>D WGS 1984</horizdn>         <ellips>WGS 1984</ellips>         <semiaxis>6378137.0</semiaxis>         <denflat>298.257223563</denflat>       </geodetic>     </horizsys>   </spref>   <eainfo>     <detailed>       <enttyp>         <enttypl>sheriffs_office_locations</enttypl>         <enttypd>Sheriff Office Locations</enttypd>         <enttypds>Denver Sheriff's Office</enttypds>       </enttyp>       <attr>         <attrlabl>OBJECTID</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Internal feature number.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>         <attrdomv>           <udom>Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.</udom>         </attrdomv>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>SHERIFF_UNIQUE_IDENTIFIER</attrlabl>         <attrdef>A unique identifier created specifically for future use.  This has no real world counterpart  It was created because tables need a primary key for joins and other database functions.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>DenverGIS</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>SHERIFF_LOCATION</attrlabl>         <attrdef>This is the name the Sheriff's office uses to identify this location.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Sheriff Department</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>ADDRESS_LINE1</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Address of this location.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Sheriff Department</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>ADDRESS_LINE2</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Second line of the address of this location.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Sheriff Department</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>LOCATION</attrlabl>         <attrdef>A description of the location that would help the public find it (i.e. inside the King Sooper's).</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Sheriff Department</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>CITY</attrlabl>         <attrdef>City in which the location is found.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Sheriff Department</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>STATE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>The specific state within the United States in which the location is found.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Sheriff Department</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>ZIP</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Zip code for this location.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Sheriff Department</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>PHONE_1</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Phone number for this office.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Sheriff Department</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>PHONE_2</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Second phone number for this location.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Sheriff Department</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>PHONE_3</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Third phone number for this location.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Sheriff's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>EMAIL_1</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Primary email address for this facility.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Sheriff's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>EMAIL_2</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Secondary email address for this facility.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Dener Sheriff's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>HOURS</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Hours of operation.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Sheriff Department</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>DESCRIPTION</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Additional descriptive information for the sheriff's office location.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Sheriff Department</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>SERVICES_AVAILABLE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>List of the services available at this location.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>Denver Sheriff Department</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr> <attrlabl>SHAPE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Feature geometry.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>         <attrdomv>           <udom>Coordinates defining the features.</udom>         </attrdomv>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>GLOBALID</attrlabl>         <attrdef>A field of type UUID (Universal Unique Identifier) in which values are automatically assigned by the geodatabase when a row is created. The GlobalID field is necessary for maintaining object uniqueness across replicas. All feature classes and tables participating in one-way or two-way replication must contain the GlobalID field. This field is not editable and is automatically populated when it is added for existing data. </attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>       </attr>     </detailed>   </eainfo>   <distinfo>     <distrib>       <cntinfo>         <cntorgp>           <cntorg>City and County of Denver, Technology Services / Enterprise Data Management</cntorg>         </cntorgp>         <cntpos>Distributor</cntpos>         <cntaddr>           <addrtype>mailing and physical</addrtype>           <address>201 W Colfax Ave, Dept 301</address>           <city>Denver</city>           <state>CO</state>           <postal>80202</postal>           <country>USA</country>         </cntaddr>         <cntfax>720-913-5237</cntfax>         <cntemail>denvergis@denvergov.org</cntemail>         <hours>M-F 8:00am - 4:30pm (MT)</hours>       </cntinfo>     </distrib>     <resdesc>Available to the public and accessible through the Denver\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds Open Data Catalog, http://data.denvergov.org/</resdesc>     <distliab>See access and use constraints information.</distliab>   </distinfo>   <metainfo>     <metd>20150319</metd>     <metstdn>FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata</metstdn>     <metstdv>FGDC-STD-001-1998</metstdv>     <mettc>local time</mettc>   </metainfo> </metadata>
